title: CRICETA 60 III / 3 / 1
body_html:
CRICETA 60 is a L shaped TINY HOUSE with a rectangular layout, offering a practical and comfortable living space. The house includes a living room connected to the kitchen, two children's bedrooms, a master bedroom, and other essential features.

The design allows direct access to the terrace from the living room, master bedroom, and one of the children's rooms. It offers two roof options: a classic gable or a hip roof.

Additionally, four terrace sizes are available to adapt to various plot layouts.

title: CRICETA REDESIGN
body_html:
BUILD UP AREA

10 WEEKS DELIVERY

Changing the floor plan of the house project, changing the layout of the interior rooms by moving parts, minor changes to utility networks, minor changes to the location or size of windows and doors.

New production plans of a wooden structure or CLT without recalculation of the statics of the structure according to the customer's requirements (according to local construction conditions - snow loading).

It includes changes in the UTILITIES installations that must be made every time the structural elements of the building are changed.

________

FLOOR PLAN

8 WEEKS DELIVERY

Changing the floor plan of the house project, changing the layout of the interior rooms by moving parts, minor changes to utility networks, minor changes to the location or size of windows and doors.

New production plans of wooden construction or CLT without recalculation of structural statics according to customer requirements (according to local construction conditions - snow loading).

It includes changes in the UTILITIES installations that must be made every time the structural elements of the building are changed.

________

SNOW LOADING

8 WEEKS DELIVERY

Changing the plan of the house project according to the local conditions of snow load, the layout of the interior rooms, minor changes to utilities, the location or size of windows and doors are not changed.

New production plans of wooden structure or CLT without recalculation of structural statics.

It includes changes in the UTILITIES installations that must be made every time the structural elements of the building are changed.

________

HVAC

10 WEEKS DELIVERY

Changing the energy concept of the house project according to the local climatic conditions and the client's needs. Complete redesign of the HVAC (Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning) system and related wiring, minor changes to other utility networks, no changes to the layout of interior rooms or the location or size of windows and doors.

New production plans of wooden structure or CLT without recalculation of structural statics.

title: CYGNUS 18
body_html:
Introducing the CYGNUS 18‚Äîthe smallest pool in our collection, designed to bring relaxation and style to any backyard. With a sleek, in-ground rectangular layout measuring 6 x 3 meters (23 x 11.5 feet), this pool offers a refined yet functional addition to your home. Thoughtfully crafted for lasting enjoyment and memorable moments, the CYGNUS 18 is the perfect choice for creating a serene family escape.

Available in two options‚Äîeither with a skimmer system or an overflow edge‚Äîfor a customized swimming experience

title: CYGNUS 30
body_html:
Transform your backyard with the CYGNUS 30, the ideal pool for passionate swimmers. With a sleek in-ground design measuring 12 x 2.5 m (26.2 x 13.1 feet) and crafted with precision, it provides a tranquil and functional space, perfect for swimming enthusiasts to enjoy endless laps and peaceful water moments.

Available in two options‚Äîeither with a skimmer system or an overflow edge‚Äîfor a customized swimming experience

title: CYGNUS 32
body_html:
Transform your backyard into a tranquil oasis for never-ending enjoyment and everlasting memories with CYGNUS 32, the perfect choice for your ideal family pool. Our expertly crafted plans feature a rectangular, underground design measuring 8 x 4 meters (23 x 11,5 feet) for a sophisticated and functional addition to your home..

Available in two options‚Äîeither with a skimmer system or an overflow edge‚Äîfor a customized swimming experience

Plus, our expert team offers domain expertise to ensure your terrace design meets the highest standards of quality and functionality.

title: LYNX 114 / 4 / 2
body_html:
LYNX 114 (1232) is a traditional bungalow with a rectangular layout, offering a practical and comfortable living space. The house includes a living room connected to the kitchen, two children's bedrooms, a master bedroom, and other essential features.

The design allows direct access to the terrace from the living room, master bedroom, and one of the children's rooms. It offers two roof options: a classic gable or a hip roof.

Additionally, four terrace sizes are available to adapt to various plot layouts.

title: LYNX 177 I / 3 / 2
body_html:
The LYNX 117 is a thoughtfully designed single-story home, ideal for narrow building plots. Its efficient layout is perfect for smaller families or couples, offering a balanced blend of comfort and functionality in a compact footprint.

With carefully planned spaces for daily living and relaxation, this home provides all the essentials while maximizing available space. The LYNX 117 is an excellent choice for those seeking a stylish, practical home tailored to fit smaller plots.

- The **master bedroom** (19.5 m¬≤ / 210 ft¬≤) features an en-suite **bathroom** (9.2 m¬≤ / 99 ft¬≤) and direct terrace access. - Two equal **children‚Äôs rooms** (17.4 m¬≤ / 187 ft¬≤ each) share a central **bathroom** (5.9 m¬≤ / 63.5 ft¬≤).

üíº Study

- A quiet **study room** (13.5 m¬≤ / 145 ft¬≤) offers a comfortable home office or guest space with outdoor views.

üîß Utility and Storage

- A **utility room** (6.5 m¬≤ / 70 ft¬≤) supports laundry and storage functions. - A spacious **entry and hall** (26.2 m¬≤ / 280 ft¬≤) ensure smooth circulation and built-in cabinetry options.

üöó Garage

- The integrated **garage** (23.5 m¬≤ / 253 ft¬≤) provides secure parking with internal access to the house.

üåø Outdoor Potential

- A premium **terrace with pool and jacuzzi** extends the living space outdoors, framed by floor-to-ceiling windows and generous lounge zones for all-day comfort.

title: PAVO 90 III / 3 / 1
body_html:
This thoughtfully designed single-story home offers an ideal layout for modern living, combining functionality, comfort, and contemporary style. The L-shaped floor plan creates a natural separation between private and social zones while providing seamless access to a potential outdoor terrace or pool area.

üè° Layout Overview
  • Total Usable Floor Area: 90.82 m¬≤ (977.61 ft¬≤)
  • Rooms: 2 Bedrooms, 1 Full Bathroom, 1 Powder Bath, Open Living Room with Kitchen and Dining Area, Pantry, Walk-in Closet/Laundry, Entry Hall
üõãÔ∏è Living and Social Space
  • A bright and open-concept living room (24.12 m¬≤ / 259.54 ft¬≤) is connected to a modern kitchen (9.85 m¬≤ / 106.03 ft¬≤) and dining area, perfect for family gatherings or entertaining guests.
  • Floor-to-ceiling windows open up the space and provide views of the garden or pool.
üõèÔ∏è Private Bedrooms
  • The home includes two well-proportioned bedrooms (16.83 m¬≤ + 10.74 m¬≤) with ample wardrobe space and comfortable layout.
  • The primary bedroom is located at the quiet end of the house, near the full bathroom.
üõÅ Bathrooms
  • A spacious main bathroom (5.89 m¬≤ / 63.39 ft¬≤) includes a bathtub, sink, and toilet.
  • A separate powder bath (2.36 m¬≤ / 25.41 ft¬≤) is located near the entry ‚Äì ideal for guests.
üß∫ Utility and Storage
  • A combined walk-in closet and laundry room (6.00 m¬≤ / 64.58 ft¬≤) provides additional functionality.
  • A pantry (2.10 m¬≤ / 22.60 ft¬≤) adjacent to the kitchen supports efficient storage and food prep.
üåø Outdoor Potential
  • The L-shape layout makes this home perfect for creating a private terrace, garden, or even integrating a swimming pool, with direct access from the living area.

title: PITCH DECK
body_html:
LYNX 116 I is a traditional bungalow with a rectangular layout and gable roof, offering a practical and comfortable living space. The house includes a living room connected to the kitchen, two children's bedrooms, a master bedroom, and other essential features.

The design allows direct access to the terrace from the living room, master bedroom, and one of the children's rooms. It offers two roof options: a classic gable or a hip roof.

Additionally, four terrace sizes are available to adapt to various plot layouts.

title: Robert Pattinson
body_html: This delivery budget was created by the LEVA team. It includes time estimates (in man-minutes) for every standard item across all LEVA house projects. Each value reflects average installation time for two moderately skilled workers. This complete budget is available for free and can be applied to any project to instantly calculate labor delivery costs.

title: SIMIA 585 / 6
body_html:
The Simia 585 residential building has three above-ground floors. It contains four three-bedroom apartments and two ground-floor studios, located next to four garages.

The studios have direct access to outdoor terraces.

The three-room apartments on the next floors share the same layout, which includes a living area with kitchen, children's room, bedroom, bathroom and hallway.

There is also the utility room located in the common area on the corridor between the apartments.This utility room can accommodate a heating system and an optional backup battery for solar panel energy

title: SIMIA 730
body_html: As a product expert, I present Sunrise 12 830/32/14 ‚Äì a modern residential house plan with 12 flats available for sale.
